member.name: M:Hangfire.Dashboard.AuthorizationFilter.SplitString(System.String)
member.summary: Splits the string on commas and removes any leading/trailing whitespace from each result item.
member.returns: An array of strings parsed from the input string.

member.name: P:Hangfire.Dashboard.AuthorizationFilter.Roles
member.summary: Gets or sets the authorized roles.
member.remarks: Multiple role names can be specified using the comma character as a separator.

member.name: P:Hangfire.Dashboard.AuthorizationFilter.Users
member.summary: Gets or sets the authorized users.
member.remarks: Multiple role names can be specified using the comma character as a separator.
